de.stock.settings

Class Settings_Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.stock.settings.Settings_Event

  • public final class Settings_Event
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides settings for the event system
    Author:
    chlange

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean EVENT_LIMIT_REACHED_ALL
      Stop executing new events if this flag is true
      static boolean EVENT_LIMIT_REACHED_HIGH
      Stop executing new events of high priority if this flag is true
      static boolean EVENT_LIMIT_REACHED_LOW
      Stop executing new events of low priority if this flag is true
      static boolean EVENT_LIMIT_REACHED_MID
      Stop executing new events of mid priority if this flag is true
      static java.lang.Integer EXECUTE_BOUND_RATE
      Used in MainEvent.execute() to check whether the event should be executed or not

      If MainEvent.hasExecBoundPassed() returns true the event gets executed if Utils.random(0, 100) is greater than this variable
      static java.lang.Integer MAX_RUNNING_EVENTS_ALL
      Number of maximum running events at the same time
      static java.lang.Integer MAX_RUNNING_EVENTS_HIGH
      Number of maximum high-priority running events at the same time
      static java.lang.Integer MAX_RUNNING_EVENTS_LOW
      Number of maximum low-priority running events at the same time
      static java.lang.Integer MAX_RUNNING_EVENTS_MID
      Number of maximum mid-priority running events at the same time
      static java.lang.Integer RUNNING_EVENTS_ALL
      Number of overall running events
      static java.lang.Integer RUNNING_EVENTS_HIGH
      Number of high-priority running events
      static java.lang.Integer RUNNING_EVENTS_LOW
      Number of low-priority running events
      static java.lang.Integer RUNNING_EVENTS_MID
      Number of mid-priority running events
      static java.lang.Integer SIGN_NEGATIVE_BOUND
      Used in MainEvent.updateIndex() to check whether sign is positive or negative

      Random between 0 and 100 and if value is <= SIGN_NEGATIVE_BOUND sign is negative

        public static final java.lang.Integer SIGN_NEGATIVE_BOUND
        Used in MainEvent.updateIndex() to check whether sign is positive or negative

        Random between 0 and 100 and if value is <= SIGN_NEGATIVE_BOUND sign is negative

      • EXECUTE_BOUND_RATE

        public static java.lang.Integer EXECUTE_BOUND_RATE
        Used in MainEvent.execute() to check whether the event should be executed or not

        If MainEvent.hasExecBoundPassed() returns true the event gets executed if Utils.random(0, 100) is greater than this variable
